00048 namespace mm

00051 using std::pair;
00052 using std::_Select1st;
00053 
00058 template < class V >
00059 struct DiscardIgnore
00060 {
00069     void operator() ( const V& old_value, const V& new_value )
00070     {}
00071 };
00072 
00092 template < class Key, 
00093            class T,
00094            class HashFunction = hash<Key>,
00095            class KeyEqual = std::equal_to<Key>,
00096            class DiscardFunction = DiscardIgnore< pair<Key,T> >,
00097            class Allocator = std::allocator< pair<Key,T> > 
00098 >
00099 class cache_map
00100 {
00101 private:
00103     typedef cache_table< pair<Key,T>, Key,
00104                          DiscardFunction,
00105                          HashFunction, KeyEqual,
00106                          _Select1st< pair<Key,T> >,
00107                          Allocator
00108                        > HT;
00109     HT m_ht;
00110         
00111 public:
00112 
00114     typedef typename HT::key_type key_type;
00115 
00117     typedef T data_type;
00118 
00120     typedef T mapped_type;
00121 
00124     typedef typename HT::value_type value_type;
00125 
00127     typedef typename HT::hasher hasher;
00128 
00130     typedef typename HT::key_equal key_equal;
00131 
00133     typedef typename HT::size_type size_type;
00134 
00136     typedef typename HT::difference_type difference_type;
00137 
00139     typedef typename HT::pointer pointer;
00140 
00142     typedef typename HT::const_pointer const_pointer;
00143 
00145     typedef typename HT::reference reference;
00146 
00148     typedef typename HT::const_reference const_reference;
00149 
00151     typedef typename HT::iterator iterator;
00152     
00154     typedef typename HT::const_iterator const_iterator;
00155     
00156 public:
00159     hasher hash_funct() const { return m_ht.hash_funct(); }
00160 
00163     key_equal key_eq() const  { return m_ht.key_eq(); }
00164 
00166     iterator begin()             { return m_ht.begin(); }
00168     iterator end()               { return m_ht.end();   }
00170     const_iterator begin() const { return m_ht.begin(); }
00172     const_iterator end()   const { return m_ht.end();   }
00173     
00174 public:
00175 
00179     cache_map() : m_ht() {}
00180     
00190     cache_map( size_type n )
00191         : m_ht( n, hasher(), key_equal() )
00192     {}
00193 
00199     cache_map( size_type n, const hasher& hash )
00200         : m_ht( n, hash, key_equal() )
00201     {}
00202 
00209     cache_map( size_type n,
00210                const hasher& hash,
00211                const key_equal& ke  )
00212         : m_ht( n, hash, ke )
00213     {}
00214 
00220     template <class InputIterator>
00221     cache_map( InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
00222         : m_ht(  2 * std::distance( first, last ) )
00223     {
00224         m_ht.insert( first, last );
00225     }
00226 
00234     template <class InputIterator>
00235     cache_map( InputIterator first, InputIterator last, size_type n )
00236             : m_ht(  2 * n )
00237     {
00238         m_ht.insert( first, last );
00239     }
00240 
00249     template <class InputIterator>
00250     cache_map( InputIterator first, InputIterator last,
00251               size_type n, const hasher& h )
00252         : m_ht(  2 * n, h )
00253     {
00254         m_ht.insert( first, last );
00255     }
00256 
00267     template <class InputIterator>
00268     cache_map( InputIterator first, InputIterator last,
00269               size_type n, const hasher& h, 
00270               const key_equal& k )
00271         : m_ht(  2 * n, h, k )
00272     {
00273         m_ht.insert( first, last );
00274     }
00275 
00280     cache_map( const cache_map& other )
00281         : m_ht( other.m_ht )
00282     {}
00283 
00289     cache_map& operator= ( const cache_map& other )
00290     {
00291         if ( &other != this )
00292         {
00293             m_ht = other.m_ht;
00294         }
00295         
00296         return *this;
00297     }
00298 
00303     void set_empty_key( const key_type& key )
00304     {
00305         m_ht.set_empty_value( value_type( key, data_type() ) );
00306     }
00307 
00312     const key_type& get_empty_key() const
00313     {
00314         return m_ht.get_empty_value().first;
00315     }
00316 
00330     pair<iterator,bool> insert( const value_type& obj )
00331     { return m_ht.insert( obj ); }
00332 
00340     pair<iterator,bool> insert( const key_type& key, const data_type& data )
00341     { return m_ht.insert( value_type( key, data ) ); }
00342 
00350     template <class InputIterator>
00351     void insert( InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
00352     { m_ht.insert( first, last ); }
00353 
00360     iterator insert( iterator it, const value_type& obj )
00361     { return m_ht.insert( obj ).first; }
00362 
00370     iterator find( const key_type& key )
00371     { return m_ht.find( key ); }
00372 
00380     const_iterator find( const key_type& key ) const
00381     { return m_ht.find( key ); }
00382 
00391     data_type& operator[]( const key_type& key )
00392     { return m_ht.find_or_insert( key ).second; }
00393 
00402     size_type erase( const key_type& key ) { return m_ht.erase( key ); }
00403 
00408     void erase( iterator it ) { m_ht.erase( it ); }
00409 
00417     void erase( iterator first, iterator last ) { m_ht.erase( first, last ); }
00418 
00420     void clear() { m_ht.clear(); }
00421 
00430     void resize( size_type size ) { m_ht.resize( size ); }
00431 
00436     void swap( cache_map& other ) { m_ht.swap( other.m_ht ); }
00437 
00443     bool operator==( const cache_map& other ) const
00444     { return m_ht == other.m_ht; }
00445 
00451     bool operator!=( const cache_map& other ) const
00452     { return m_ht != other.m_ht; }
00453 
00459     size_type size()         const { return m_ht.size(); }
00460     
00466     size_type max_size()     const { return m_ht.max_size(); }
00467 
00473     size_type bucket_count() const { return m_ht.bucket_count(); }
00474     
00478     bool empty()             const { return m_ht.empty(); }
00479 
00484     size_type num_collisions() const { return m_ht.num_collisions(); }
00485 
00491     friend inline void swap(
00492         cache_map<Key,T,HashFunction,KeyEqual,DiscardFunction,Allocator>& m1,
00493         cache_map<Key,T,HashFunction,KeyEqual,DiscardFunction,Allocator>& m2 )
00494     {
00495         m1.swap( m2 );
00496     }
00497     
00498 };
